response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a unique value that resonates with its high-quality materials and innovative features. Considering its unparalleled nature, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at an introductory price of $10,000. This offer is designed to provide you with the best value while ensuring you experience the unparalleled benefits this product offers. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to serve you. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 10000}
